info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 7:44PM CDT until May 17 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Furnas County in south central Nebraska... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 744 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Edison, or 23 miles southwest of Holdrege, moving east at no more than 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 740 PM CDT, half dollar size hail was reported in Edison by a trained spotter. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Oxford, Edison and Hollinger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
